sentence.Network_en: "Now don't you worry," she said soothingly.
sentence.Network_cn: “现在你就别担心了，”她的语气里充满了抚慰。

sentence.Network_en: The mother talked soothingly to her child.
sentence.Network_cn: 母亲对自己的孩子安慰地说.

sentence.Network_en: He continued to talk quietly and soothingly to the girl until her frightened grip on his arm was relaxed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他继续柔声安慰那姑娘,她那因恐惧而紧抓住他的手终于放松了.

entry.def: If you soothe someone who is angry or upset, you make them feel calmer.

example.ex: He would take her in his arms and soothe her...
example.tran: 他会把她揽在怀中抚慰她。

example.ex: It did not take long for the central bank to soothe investors' fears.
example.tran: 中央银行很快便消除了投资者的担忧。

entry.tran: 减轻，缓和(身体的痛处或不适)
entry.def: Something that soothes a part of your body where there is pain or discomfort makes the pain or discomfort less severe.

example.tran: 滋润干燥皮肤的润肤液

sentences.sentence: "the mother talked soothingly to her child"

auth_sentence.content: He put out a hand to touch my forearm soothingly.
auth_sentence.res_content: He put out a hand to touch my forearm soothingly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He put out a hand to touch my forearm soothingly.

auth_sentence.content: David's mother stroked her shoulders soothingly.
